title: M5: Identify Light Post-Editing
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: intermediate. * SUPERVISION: self-assessment * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 5 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: English, Spanish. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: Instructors can change the languages as desired, ensuring that 'levels' for each example remain the same. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: This activity focuses on concepts discussed in section 2 of chapter 5. Students should choose the option that has been edited correctly according to TAUS guidelines.
